DOC.brief_summary: In study evaluate effect three different dos oral testosterone undecanoate age men present combination symptom suggestive hypogonadism low blood level male hormone testosterone . Specifically , studied effect : - symptom suggestive low testosterone level - blood testosterone hormone level - bone mass - muscle mass fat mass - muscle strength - prostate - lipid , hematocrit
DOC.brief_title: Effects Andriol Testocaps Symptomatic Late-Onset Hypogonadism ( 43203 )
DOC.criteria: Subjects least 50 year age A body mass index ( BMI ) 18 34 kg/m^2 Symptoms androgen deficiency ( indicated positive Androgen Deficiency Aging Males ( ADAM ) questionnaire ) Calculated free testosterone measurement < 0.26 nmol/L morning History current diagnosis breast prostate cancer clinically significant abnormal find physical examination include prostate Clinical symptom obstructive benign prostate hyperplasia ( International Prostate Symptom Score ( IPSS ) > 14 ) Prostate specific antigen ( PSA ) level > 4 ng/mL screening Cause androgen deficiency age , e.g . 'classical ' diagnosis primary secondary hypogonadism Hyperprolactinaemia treatment prolactinlowering drug History know chronic polycythemia and/or hematocrit > 50 % screen History presence severe sleep apnea Unstable untreated endocrine disorder History presence clinically significant depression psychiatric disorder clinically relevant cardiovascular , cerebrovascular , endocrine , hepatic , renal hematological disease , thromboembolism/thrombosis etc . , opinion investigator , might compromise subject 's participation trial Use medication would interfere efficacy safety objectives trial
